0: A very comfortable room with a good breakfast
The room itself was great with free wifi free minibar free snacks with a comfortable and modern decor
Hotel room great nice design well furnished free snacks and free drinks in minibar
Even an Apple TV and a printer which was super handy

a late night snack bag was offered if you came back to the hotel later at night that came with cup onodles you have a hot water maker in the room bottled water alka seltzer and tylenol super cute and thoughtful of them for hangovers haha
Staff is very nice and helpful and rooms have an acceptable size especially for Hong Kong
Free mini bar and welcome pack of goodies is another nice touch
Very good central locationFriendly very helpful stafAmenities in the hotel room excelentBreakfast next door also very godThe hotel room is of a good size and has everything in it that you need
If you want a solid basecamp in hong kong with a friendly and helpful staff a decent free wifi 2 free beers a day in the fridge a comfy bed and a spacious silent room 20th floor this is the place
We were very pleasantly surprised by the size of the room its comfort and the electronic connections
1: The room is very fancy and modern I like it very much
I booked through hotelscom and got a room on the 3rd floor which is handicap accessible
2: A bit loud at night and that musty smell coming out of AC and present in the room at all time small but slightly annoying feature
The shower door opened in and needed to be squeezed into every time a shower was required which is often in early September after a walk
View of other tall buildings and not too much sunlight
They need to consolidate theirs windows and to put triple glass window
But I ’m rating it 35 because of noise not only because the hotel is under a big construction but also the rooms are noisy and you are hearing everything from outside musics and people shouting
I booked at a higher price through the ovolo website to get free mini bar
No umbrella minimal bathroom Minimal alcohol offering and minimum space for patrons
